text:
Going Ringside Ep. 11: The Chris Benoit murder-suicide

Published: May 10, 2023 at 10:11 AM Updated: May 10, 2023 at 2:57 PM

The wrestling world stopped in June of 2007 when a tragedy beyond anything the industry had ever seen occurred over a three day period in Fayetteville, GA. One of the top performers in the industry, Chris Benoit, who had been heralded for years and was a former world champion had killed his family. The impact on the industry continues to this day as it still remains a tragedy that is seldom talked about in the industry.
